title: Clearing of the Way
description: From the moment she was born, Nathalie was always the odd one out, gifted by a force that comes to her in her dreams. The only person who feels right... a homeless and insane man, Gideon. Little does Nathalie know that her gifts are meant to stand against a coming darkness, and that Gideon isn't as crazy as he seems. As the world starts to fall, she will need to accept him, and her destiny, if she is to become a champion for humanity.
author: Melissa Cuevas
